name: Copycat McDonald's Peanut Butter Crunch McFlurry
description: Made with only 3 ingredients and in a mere 10 minutes, this copycat peanut butter crunch McFlurry is way cooler than waiting in the drive thru line.
ingredients: 1 1/2 quarts old-fashioned vanilla ice cream (about 6 cups)
2 cups crushed peanut butter chocolate cookies
instructions: Gather the ingredients. Add the ice cream and milk to a blender or food processor and pulse repeatedly until it forms the consistency of traditional soft-serve ice cream. Begin building the McFlurrys, filling each cup with about 3/4 cup of ice cream, followed by a layer of 1/4 cup of the cookie mixture. Repeat this step once more. Insert a wide straw and pump it up and down a few times to incorporate the cookie mixture into the ice cream before enjoying.
